lexUnit.definition: COD: a unit of linear measure equal to one twelfth of a foot (2.54 cm)

sentence.text: Marvel at Henri La Mothe as he dives 28 feet into 12–⅜ inches of water .
Mick called off his club 's Open on the Coventry Canal due to four inches of ice .
I hid the inch of yellow knitting , which represented two hours ' work , under my chair , tipped the lampshade to a more discreet angle , and called , " Come in . "
